definitions.definition: Substitution of a different person in place of a creditor or claimant with respect to certain rights and duties.
examples: Subrogation is a staple element of the casualty insurance business.
He became my creditor as the result of a subrogation by a vendor.

main_definition: ( law ) Substitution of a different person in place of a creditor or claimant with respect to certain rights and duties.
